About This Lab

Objective: Explore the performance improvements brought by Adaptive SQL Execution
File locations:
Successful outcome:
Before you begin:
Related lessons: What's New in Spark 3.0?

Copyright © 2010–2020 Cloudera. All rights reserved.
Not to be reproduced or shared without prior written consent from Cloudera.

paragraphs.text:
%md

## Overview

In this lab we will explore how Adaptive SQL Execution works in the following use cases:

* Dynamically Adapt Number of Shuffle Partitions 
* Dynamically Switch Join Strategies
* Dynamically Coalesce Shuffle Partitions

msg.data:
Overview

In this lab we will explore how Adaptive SQL Execution works in the following use cases:

  • Dynamically Adapt Number of Shuffle Partitions
  • Dynamically Switch Join Strategies
  • Dynamically Coalesce Shuffle Partitions

paragraphs.text:
%md
# Setup
---

%md

We will compare the execution of identical code 
* in Spark 2.4 with spark.sql.adaptive.enabled=false and
* in Spark 3.0 with spark.sql.adaptive.enabled=true

We will run the code in Spark 2.4 in this notebook and then copy, paste and execute it in spark3-shell.
Then we will be able to compare the executions in
* the Spark 2 History Server on port 18088 and
* the Spark 3 History Server on port 18089.

paragraphs.title: Environment variable required to use SetJobGroup
paragraphs.text:
%sh

PYSPARK_PIN_THREAD=true

paragraphs.title: Disable Adaptive SQL Execution for Spark 2.4
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

spark.conf.set("spark.sql.adaptive.enabled", "false")

%md

## Create a TPCDS queries ready database

paragraphs.title: Generate the data
paragraphs.text:
%sh

rm -rf  /var/lib/zeppelin/tmp/tpcds
mkdir -p  /var/lib/zeppelin/tmp/tpcds
cd /home/training/training_materials/perf/tpcds-kit/tools
./dsdgen -SCALE 1 -DIR /var/lib/zeppelin/tmp/tpcds

paragraphs.title: Put the data in HDFS
paragraphs.text:
%sh

hdfs dfs -mkdir -p /spark-perf/tpcds/store_returns
hdfs dfs -mkdir -p /spark-perf/tpcds/time_dim
hdfs dfs -mkdir -p /spark-perf/tpcds/date_dim
hdfs dfs -mkdir -p /spark-perf/tpcds/store
hdfs dfs -mkdir -p /spark-perf/tpcds/customer
hdfs dfs -mkdir -p /spark-perf/tpcds/web_sales
hdfs dfs -mkdir -p /spark-perf/tpcds/catalog_sales
hdfs dfs -mkdir -p /spark-perf/tpcds/store_sales
hdfs dfs -mkdir -p /spark-perf/tpcds/item
hdfs dfs -mkdir -p /spark-perf/tpcds/catalog_returns
hdfs dfs -mkdir -p /spark-perf/tpcds/catalog_page
hdfs dfs -mkdir -p /spark-perf/tpcds/web_returns
hdfs dfs -mkdir -p /spark-perf/tpcds/web_site
hdfs dfs -mkdir -p /spark-perf/tpcds/customer_address
hdfs dfs -mkdir -p /spark-perf/tpcds/customer_demographics
hdfs dfs -mkdir -p /spark-perf/tpcds/promotion
hdfs dfs -mkdir -p /spark-perf/tpcds/reason
hdfs dfs -mkdir -p /spark-perf/tpcds/household_demographics
hdfs dfs -mkdir -p /spark-perf/tpcds/call_center
hdfs dfs -mkdir -p /spark-perf/tpcds/inventory
hdfs dfs -mkdir -p /spark-perf/tpcds/warehouse
hdfs dfs -mkdir -p /spark-perf/tpcds/web_page
hdfs dfs -mkdir -p /spark-perf/tpcds/income_band
hdfs dfs -mkdir -p /spark-perf/tpcds/ship_mode
hdfs dfs -put -f  /var/lib/zeppelin/tmp/tpcds/store_returns.dat /spark-perf/tpcds/store_returns
hdfs dfs -put -f  /var/lib/zeppelin/tmp/tpcds/time_dim.dat /spark-perf/tpcds/time_dim
hdfs dfs -put -f  /var/lib/zeppelin/tmp/tpcds/date_dim.dat /spark-perf/tpcds/date_dim
hdfs dfs -put -f  /var/lib/zeppelin/tmp/tpcds/store.dat /spark-perf/tpcds/store
hdfs dfs -put -f  /var/lib/zeppelin/tmp/tpcds/customer.dat /spark-perf/tpcds/customer
hdfs dfs -put -f  /var/lib/zeppelin/tmp/tpcds/web_sales.dat /spark-perf/tpcds/web_sales
hdfs dfs -put -f  /var/lib/zeppelin/tmp/tpcds/catalog_sales.dat /spark-perf/tpcds/catalog_sales
hdfs dfs -put -f  /var/lib/zeppelin/tmp/tpcds/store_sales.dat /spark-perf/tpcds/store_sales
hdfs dfs -put -f  /var/lib/zeppelin/tmp/tpcds/item.dat /spark-perf/tpcds/item
hdfs dfs -put -f  /var/lib/zeppelin/tmp/tpcds/catalog_page.dat /spark-perf/tpcds/catalog_page
hdfs dfs -put -f  /var/lib/zeppelin/tmp/tpcds/web_returns.dat /spark-perf/tpcds/web_returns
hdfs dfs -put -f  /var/lib/zeppelin/tmp/tpcds/web_site.dat /spark-perf/tpcds/web_site
hdfs dfs -put -f  /var/lib/zeppelin/tmp/tpcds/customer_address.dat /spark-perf/tpcds/customer_address

hdfs dfs -put -f  /var/lib/zeppelin/tmp/tpcds/household_demographics.dat /spark-perf/tpcds/household_demographics

paragraphs.title: Create the database
paragraphs.text:
%sql

CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS tpcds

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Use the database
paragraphs.text:
%sql

USE tpcds

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Create the store_returns table
paragraphs.text:
%sql

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS  store_returns ( 
                                        sr_returned_date_sk bigint, 
                                        sr_return_time_sk bigint, 
                                        sr_item_sk bigint, 
                                        sr_customer_sk bigint, 
                                        sr_cdemo_sk bigint, 
                                        sr_hdemo_sk bigint, 
                                        sr_addr_sk bigint, 
                                        sr_store_sk bigint,
                                        sr_reason_sk bigint,
                                        sr_ticket_number bigint,
                                        sr_return_quantity int,
                                        sr_return_amt decimal(7,2),
                                        sr_return_tax decimal(7,2),
                                        sr_return_amt_inc_tax decimal(7,2),
                                        sr_fee decimal(7,2),
                                        sr_return_ship_cost decimal(7,2),
                                        sr_refunded_cash decimal(7,2),
                                        sr_reversed_charge decimal(7,2),
                                        sr_store_credit decimal(7,2),
                                        sr_net_loss decimal(7,2))
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED 
FIELDS TERMINATED BY '|'
STORED AS TEXTFILE
LOCATION '/spark-perf/tpcds/store_returns'

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Create the time_dim table
paragraphs.text:
%sql

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS  time_dim (
                                        t_time_sk bigint,
                                        t_time_id string,
                                        t_time int,
                                        t_hour int,
                                        t_minute int,
                                        t_second int,
                                        t_am_pm string,
                                        t_shift string,
                                        t_sub_shift string,
                                        t_meal_time string)
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED 
FIELDS TERMINATED BY '|'
STORED AS TEXTFILE
LOCATION '/spark-perf/tpcds/time_dim'

paragraphs.title: Create the date_dim table
paragraphs.text:
%sql

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS  date_dim (
                                        d_date_sk bigint,
                                        d_date_id string,
                                        d_date string,
                                        d_month_seq int,
                                        d_week_seq int,
                                        d_quarter_seq int,
                                        d_year int,
                                        d_dow int,
                                        d_moy int,
                                        d_dom int,
                                        d_qoy int,
                                        d_fy_year int,
                                        d_fy_quarter_seq int,
                                        d_fy_week_seq int,
                                        d_day_name string,
                                        d_quarter_name string,
                                        d_holiday string,
                                        d_weekend string,
                                        d_following_holiday string,
                                        d_first_dom int,
                                        d_last_dom int,
                                        d_same_day_ly int,
                                        d_same_day_lq int,
                                        d_current_day string,
                                        d_current_week string,
                                        d_current_month string,
                                        d_current_quarter string,
                                        d_current_year string)
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED 
FIELDS TERMINATED BY '|'
STORED AS TEXTFILE
LOCATION '/spark-perf/tpcds/date_dim'

paragraphs.title: Create the store table
paragraphs.text:
%sql

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS  store (
                                        s_store_sk bigint,
                                        s_store_id string,
                                        s_rec_start_date string,
                                        s_rec_end_date string,
                                        s_closed_date_sk bigint,
                                        s_store_name string,
                                        s_number_employees int,
                                        s_floor_space int,
                                        s_hours string,
                                        s_manager string,
                                        s_market_id int,
                                        s_geography_class string,
                                        s_market_desc string,
                                        s_market_manager string,
                                        s_division_id int,
                                        s_division_name string,
                                        s_company_id int,
                                        s_company_name string,
                                        s_street_number string,
                                        s_street_name string,
                                        s_street_type string,
                                        s_suite_number string,
                                        s_city string,
                                        s_county string,
                                        s_state string,
                                        s_zip string,
                                        s_country string,
                                        s_gmt_offset decimal(5,2),
                                        s_tax_precentage decimal(5,2))
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED 
FIELDS TERMINATED BY '|'
STORED AS TEXTFILE
LOCATION '/spark-perf/tpcds/store'

paragraphs.title: Create the web_sales table
paragraphs.text:
%sql

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS  web_sales (
                                        ws_sold_date_sk bigint,
                                        ws_sold_time_sk bigint,
                                        ws_ship_date_sk bigint,
                                        ws_item_sk bigint,
                                        ws_bill_customer_sk bigint,
                                        ws_bill_cdemo_sk bigint,
                                        ws_bill_hdemo_sk bigint,
                                        ws_bill_addr_sk bigint,
                                        ws_ship_customer_sk bigint,
                                        ws_ship_cdemo_sk bigint,
                                        ws_ship_hdemo_sk bigint,
                                        ws_ship_addr_sk bigint,
                                        ws_web_page_sk bigint,
                                        ws_web_site_sk bigint,
                                        ws_ship_mode_sk bigint,
                                        ws_warehouse_sk bigint,
                                        ws_promo_sk bigint,
                                        ws_order_number bigint,
                                        ws_quantity int,
                                        ws_wholesale_cost decimal(7,2),
                                        ws_list_price decimal(7,2),
                                        ws_sales_price decimal(7,2),
                                        ws_ext_discount_amt decimal(7,2),
                                        ws_ext_sales_price decimal(7,2),
                                        ws_ext_wholesale_cost decimal(7,2),
                                        ws_ext_list_price decimal(7,2),
                                        ws_ext_tax decimal(7,2),
                                        ws_coupon_amt decimal(7,2),
                                        ws_ext_ship_cost decimal(7,2),
                                        ws_net_paid decimal(7,2),
                                        ws_net_paid_inc_tax decimal(7,2),
                                        ws_net_paid_inc_ship decimal(7,2),
                                        ws_net_paid_inc_ship_tax decimal(7,2),
                                        ws_net_profit decimal(7,2))
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED 
FIELDS TERMINATED BY '|'
STORED AS TEXTFILE
LOCATION '/spark-perf/tpcds/web_sales'

paragraphs.title: Create the catalog_sales table
paragraphs.text:
%sql

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS catalog_sales (
                                      cs_sold_date_sk bigint,
                                      cs_sold_time_sk bigint,
                                      cs_ship_date_sk bigint,

                                      cs_call_center_sk bigint,
                                      cs_catalog_page_sk bigint,
                                      cs_ship_mode_sk bigint,
                                      cs_warehouse_sk bigint,
                                      cs_item_sk bigint,
                                      cs_promo_sk bigint,
                                      cs_order_number bigint,
                                      cs_quantity int,
                                      cs_wholesale_cost decimal(7,2),
                                      cs_list_price decimal(7,2),
                                      cs_sales_price decimal(7,2),
                                      cs_ext_discount_amt decimal(7,2),
                                      cs_ext_sales_price decimal(7,2),
                                      cs_ext_wholesale_cost decimal(7,2),
                                      cs_ext_list_price decimal(7,2),
                                      cs_ext_tax decimal(7,2),
                                      cs_coupon_amt decimal(7,2),
                                      cs_ext_ship_cost decimal(7,2),
                                      cs_net_paid decimal(7,2),
                                      cs_net_paid_inc_tax decimal(7,2),
                                      cs_net_paid_inc_ship decimal(7,2),
                                      cs_net_paid_inc_ship_tax decimal(7,2),
                                      cs_net_profit decimal(7,2)) 
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED 
FIELDS TERMINATED BY '|'
STORED AS TEXTFILE
LOCATION '/spark-perf/tpcds/catalog_sales'

paragraphs.title: Create the store_sales table
paragraphs.text:
%sql

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS store_sales (
                                        ss_sold_date_sk           bigint,
                                        ss_sold_time_sk           bigint,
                                        ss_item_sk                bigint,
                                        ss_customer_sk            bigint,
                                        ss_cdemo_sk               bigint,
                                        ss_hdemo_sk               bigint,
                                        ss_addr_sk                bigint,
                                        ss_store_sk               bigint,
                                        ss_promo_sk               bigint,
                                        ss_ticket_number          bigint,
                                        ss_quantity               int,
                                        ss_wholesale_cost         decimal(7,2),
                                        ss_list_price             decimal(7,2),
                                        ss_sales_price            decimal(7,2),
                                        ss_ext_discount_amt       decimal(7,2),
                                        ss_ext_sales_price        decimal(7,2),
                                        ss_ext_wholesale_cost     decimal(7,2),
                                        ss_ext_list_price         decimal(7,2),
                                        ss_ext_tax                decimal(7,2),
                                        ss_coupon_amt             decimal(7,2),
                                        ss_net_paid               decimal(7,2),
                                        ss_net_paid_inc_tax       decimal(7,2),
                                        ss_net_profit             decimal(7,2)) 
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED

paragraphs.title: Create the web_returns table
paragraphs.text:
%sql

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS web_returns ( 
                                      wr_returned_date_sk bigint,
                                      wr_returned_time_sk bigint,
                                      wr_item_sk bigint,
                                      wr_refunded_customer_sk bigint,
                                      wr_refunded_cdemo_sk bigint,
                                      wr_refunded_hdemo_sk bigint,
                                      wr_refunded_addr_sk bigint,
                                      wr_returning_customer_sk bigint,
                                      wr_returning_cdemo_sk bigint,
                                      wr_returning_hdemo_sk bigint,
                                      wr_returning_addr_sk bigint,
                                      wr_web_page_sk bigint,
                                      wr_reason_sk bigint,
                                      wr_order_number bigint,
                                      wr_return_quantity int,
                                      wr_return_amt decimal(7,2),
                                      wr_return_tax decimal(7,2),
                                      wr_return_amt_inc_tax decimal(7,2),
                                      wr_fee decimal(7,2),
                                      wr_return_ship_cost decimal(7,2),
                                      wr_refunded_cash decimal(7,2),
                                      wr_reversed_charge decimal(7,2),
                                      wr_account_credit decimal(7,2),
                                      wr_net_loss decimal(7,2))
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED 
FIELDS TERMINATED BY '|'
STORED AS TEXTFILE
LOCATION '/spark-perf/tpcds/web_returns'

paragraphs.text:
%md
# Demo
---

%md
First we are going to establish a baseline with Spark2.4.

%md
## Dynamically Adapt Number of Shuffle Partitions

paragraphs.title: q1.sql: Spark 2.4 - Fails to adapt the number of shuffle partitions
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

sc.setJobGroup("TPCDS","q1.sql: Spark 2.4 - Fails to adapt the number of shuffle partitions")

spark.sql("USE tpcds")

spark.sql("WITH customer_total_return AS                            \
            (SELECT sr_customer_sk AS ctr_customer_sk,              \
                    sr_store_sk AS ctr_store_sk,                    \
                    sum(sr_return_amt) AS ctr_total_return          \
            FROM store_returns, date_dim                            \
            WHERE sr_returned_date_sk = d_date_sk AND d_year = 2000 \
            GROUP BY sr_customer_sk, sr_store_sk)                   \
            SELECT c_customer_id                                    \
            FROM customer_total_return ctr1, store, customer        \
            WHERE ctr1.ctr_total_return >                           \
                (SELECT avg(ctr_total_return)*1.2                   \
                FROM customer_total_return ctr2                     \
                WHERE ctr1.ctr_store_sk = ctr2.ctr_store_sk)        \
            AND s_store_sk = ctr1.ctr_store_sk                      \
            AND s_state = 'TN'                                      \
            AND ctr1.ctr_customer_sk = c_customer_sk                \
            ORDER BY c_customer_id LIMIT 100").show()

%md

Spark 2.4 without AQE enabled fails to adapt the number of partitions after the shuffle.

![Spark 2.4 - Fails to adapt the number of shuffle partitions](app/images/Spark2_4-FailsToAdaptTheNumberOfPartitions.png)

%md
## Dynamically Switch Join Strategies

paragraphs.title: Spark 2.4 - Fails to convert a sort merge join to a broadcast join
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

sc.setJobGroup("TPCDS","q2.sql: Fails to convert a sort merge join to a broadcast join")

spark.sql("USE tpcds")

spark.sql("WITH wscs as                                                                                         \
            (SELECT sold_date_sk, sales_price                                                                   \
            FROM (SELECT ws_sold_date_sk sold_date_sk, ws_ext_sales_price sales_price FROM web_sales            \
                  UNION ALL                                                                                     \
                  SELECT cs_sold_date_sk sold_date_sk, cs_ext_sales_price sales_price FROM catalog_sales) x),   \
            wswscs AS                                                                                           \
            (SELECT d_week_seq,                                                                                 \
                    sum(case when (d_day_name='Sunday') then sales_price else null end) sun_sales,              \
                    sum(case when (d_day_name='Monday') then sales_price else null end) mon_sales,              \
                    sum(case when (d_day_name='Tuesday') then sales_price else  null end) tue_sales,            \
                    sum(case when (d_day_name='Wednesday') then sales_price else null end) wed_sales,           \
                    sum(case when (d_day_name='Thursday') then sales_price else null end) thu_sales,            \
                    sum(case when (d_day_name='Friday') then sales_price else null end) fri_sales,              \
                    sum(case when (d_day_name='Saturday') then sales_price else null end) sat_sales             \
            FROM wscs, date_dim                                                                                 \
            WHERE d_date_sk = sold_date_sk                                                                      \
            GROUP BY d_week_seq)                                                                                \
            SELECT  d_week_seq1,                                                                                \
                    round(sun_sales1/sun_sales2,2),                                                             \
                    round(mon_sales1/mon_sales2,2),                                                             \
                    round(tue_sales1/tue_sales2,2),                                                             \
                    round(wed_sales1/wed_sales2,2),                                                             \
                    round(thu_sales1/thu_sales2,2),                                                             \
                    round(fri_sales1/fri_sales2,2),                                                             \
                    round(sat_sales1/sat_sales2,2)                                                              \
            FROM                                                                                                \
            (SELECT wswscs.d_week_seq d_week_seq1,                                                              \
                    sun_sales sun_sales1,                                                                       \
                    mon_sales mon_sales1,                                                                       \
                    tue_sales tue_sales1,                                                                       \
                    wed_sales wed_sales1,                                                                       \
                    thu_sales thu_sales1,                                                                       \
                    fri_sales fri_sales1,                                                                       \
                    sat_sales sat_sales1                                                                        \
            FROM wswscs,date_dim                                                                                \
            WHERE date_dim.d_week_seq = wswscs.d_week_seq AND d_year = 2001) y,                                 \
            (SELECT wswscs.d_week_seq d_week_seq2,                                                              \
                    sun_sales sun_sales2,                                                                       \
                    mon_sales mon_sales2,                                                                       \
                    tue_sales tue_sales2,                                                                       \
                    wed_sales wed_sales2,                                                                       \
                    thu_sales thu_sales2,                                                                       \
                    fri_sales fri_sales2,                                                                       \
                    sat_sales sat_sales2                                                                        \
            FROM wswscs, date_dim                                                                               \
            WHERE date_dim.d_week_seq = wswscs.d_week_seq AND d_year = 2001 + 1) z                              \
            WHERE d_week_seq1=d_week_seq2-53                                                                    \
            ORDER BY d_week_seq1").show()

%md

Spark 2.4 without AQE enabled fails to convert a sort merge join to a broadcast join

![Spark 2.4 - Fails to convert a sort merge join to a broadcast join](app/images/Spark2_4-FailsToConvertASortMergeJoinToABroadcastJoin.png)

%md
## Dynamically Coalesce Shuffle Partitions

paragraphs.title: Spark 2.4 - Does not coalesce shuffle partitions
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

sc.setJobGroup("TPCDS","q21.sql: Does not coalesce shuffle partitions")

spark.sql("USE tpcds")

spark.sql(" \
select * from( \
  select w_warehouse_name, i_item_id, \
         sum(case when (cast(d_date as date) < cast ('2000-03-11' as date)) \
                   then inv_quantity_on_hand \
                  else 0 end) as inv_before, \
         sum(case when (cast(d_date as date) >= cast ('2000-03-11' as date)) \
                  then inv_quantity_on_hand \
                  else 0 end) as inv_after \
  from inventory, warehouse, item, date_dim \
  where i_current_price between 0.99 and 1.49 \
    and i_item_sk          = inv_item_sk \
    and inv_warehouse_sk   = w_warehouse_sk \
    and inv_date_sk        = d_date_sk \
    and d_date between (cast('2000-03-11' as date) - interval '30' day) \
                   and (cast('2000-03-11' as date) + interval '30' day) \
  group by w_warehouse_name, i_item_id) x \
where (case when inv_before > 0 \
            then inv_after / inv_before \
            else null \
            end) between 2.0/3.0 and 3.0/2.0 \
order by w_warehouse_name, i_item_id \
limit 100").show()

%md

Spark 2.4 without AQE does not coalesce the shuffle partitions.

![Spark 2.4 without AQE does not coalesce the shuffle partitions.](app/images/Spark2_4-DoesNotCoalesceShufflePartitions.png)

%md
# Lab
---

%md

1) Stop the Zeppelin server.
2) Open a terminal on your cluster 
3) Set this environment variable: PYSPARK_PIN_THREAD=true
4) Start the pyspark3 shell
3) Make sure to set ``spark.sql.adaptive.enabled`` to true.
4) Make sure to use the tpcds database
5) Copy the content of each code cell above and paste it in the pyspark3 shell
6) Open the history servers for Spark2 and Spark3 and compare the executions

%md
## Bonus

If you have time explore how AQE improves the execution of some of the [TPCDS queries](https://github.com/databricks/spark-sql-perf/tree/master/src/main/resources/tpcds_2_4).

%md
# Result
**You have now:** explored the performance improvements brought by Adaptive SQL Execution

---

%md
# Solution
---

%md

Spark 3.0 with AQE enabled manages to adapt the number of partitions after the shuffle.
Note that the Spark UI has become more difficult to read with the introduction of new jobs.

![Spark 3.0 - Manages to adapt the number of shuffle partitions](app/images/Spark3_0-AQEManagesToAdaptTheNumberOfPartitions.png)

%md

Spark 3.0 with AQE manages to convert a sort merge join to a broadcast join.

![Spark 3.0 - fails to convert a sort merge join to a broadcast join](app/images/Spark3_0-AQEManagesToConvertASortMergeJoinToABroadcastJoin.png)

%md

Spark 3.0 with AQE coalesces the shuffle partitions using CoalescedShuffleReaders.

![Spark 3.0 with AQE coalesces the shuffle partitions](app/images/Spark3_0-AQECoalescesShufflePartitions.png)

%md
# Tear Down
---

%sh

sessionId=$(curl -s localhost:8998/sessions | jq '.sessions[0].id')
curl -s localhost:8998/sessions/$sessionId -X DELETE

%md
### References

[Spark SQL: Adaptive Query Execution](https://medium.com/swlh/spark-sql-adaptive-query-execution-3adc68973c91)
[Spark 2.x to spark 3.0 — Adaptive Query Execution — Part1](https://medium.com/data-engineering-for-all/spark-2-x-to-spark-3-0-adaptive-query-execution-part1-182e61e6cfcb)
[Generate the data with the tpcds-kit](https://github.com/databricks/tpcds-kit)
[Create the TPCDS tables](https://discover.qubole.com/notebook_examples/37/view_standalone)
[TPCDS queries](https://github.com/databricks/spark-sql-perf/tree/master/src/main/resources/tpcds_2_4)

paragraphs.title: Additional resources
paragraphs.text:
%md
We hope you've enjoyed this lab. Below are additional resources that you should find useful:

1. [Cloudera Tutorials](http://cloudera.com/tutorials.html) are your natural next step where you can explore Spark in more depth.
2. [Cloudera Community](https://community.cloudera.com) is a great resource for questions and answers on Spark, Data Analytics/Science, and many more Big Data topics.
3. [Apache Spark Documentation](https://spark.apache.org/documentation.html) - official Spark documentation.
4. [Apache Zeppelin Project Home Page](https://zeppelin.apache.org) - official Zeppelin web site.

paragraphs.text: %angular
%angular
